originalText.text: Dr Bronfin was a a godsend. She was so thorough and helped my husband get an accurate diagnosis. She helped us see specialists at Langone that were booked for months out. Isabella is wonderful and has been so helpful through the process. I recommend Dr. Bronfin and NYU Langone highly.

text.text: Dr Bronfin was a a godsend. She was so thorough and helped my husband get an accurate diagnosis. She helped us see specialists at Langone that were booked for months out. Isabella is wonderful and has been so helpful through the process. I recommend Dr. Bronfin and NYU Langone highly.

originalText.text: Dr Bronfin is an excellent doctor. She works incredibly hard to ensure that her patients are well taken care of. I came in with an incredibly odd constellation of symptoms and she was able to diagnose me and help me get the treatment I needed. She is wonderful and I recommend her to everybody I know. Moreover, I have seen reviews that degrade and berate her office staff. In my experience Dr. Bronfin and her entire staff were nothing but nice and helpful. Honestly one of the best medical office visits I have ever had.

originalText.text: Excellent care and bedside manner. I saw Dr. Bronfin for Bell’s palsy. As a new patient, she scheduled me to come in to see her immediately. She was thorough and reassuring, and she was compassionate. Her bedside manner was like a salve when I was feeling very vulnerable. I’m grateful for her care.

text.text: Excellent care and bedside manner. I saw Dr. Bronfin for Bell’s palsy. As a new patient, she scheduled me to come in to see her immediately. She was thorough and reassuring, and she was compassionate. Her bedside manner was like a salve when I was feeling very vulnerable. I’m grateful for her care.

originalText.text:
I went to see Dr. Ludmilla Bronfin back in 2021. I was waiting in her office for 2 hours before the front desk receptionist informed me that Dr. Bronfin would like me to complete certain tests. I was utterly confused as I asked if I would be seeing the Dr. but I was told I would not be seeing the Dr and that I should take the tests she recommended and make a follow up appointment. Has anyone been to a Dr's office and told to take tests without even been seen or talked to by the physician?! I expressed my concern and sheer disappointment with the receptionist who then double checked with the physician. Again, I was told although the physician was in the office, I would not be seeing her. To add to it all, the receptionist started to describe my medical history and the tests Dr. Bronfin wanted me to get in front of the whole waiting area - that has to be some form of HIPAA violation? By far the worst experience I have faced in a Dr.s office - extremely unprofessional and flat out disrespectful. I had not arrived late, it was not a last minute appointment.
The doctor did not see me, she did not call me, nothing. I wrote this over a year later because it was such a stressful and scary moment for my health. I am grateful to have found physicians who care for their patients and their time.

Edit 10/20/22
In response to Dr. Bronfins comment below- I did not make any calls to the office since 2021.

I went to see Dr. Ludmilla Bronfin back in 2021. I was waiting in her office for 2 hours before the front desk receptionist informed me that Dr. Bronfin would like me to complete certain tests. I was utterly confused as I asked if I would be seeing the Dr. but I was told I would not be seeing the Dr and that I should take the tests she recommended and make a follow up appointment. Has anyone been to a Dr's office and told to take tests without even been seen or talked to by the physician?! I expressed my concern and sheer disappointment with the receptionist who then double checked with the physician. Again, I was told although the physician was in the office, I would not be seeing her. To add to it all, the receptionist started to describe my medical history and the tests Dr. Bronfin wanted me to get in front of the whole waiting area - that has to be some form of HIPAA violation? By far the worst experience I have faced in a Dr.s office - extremely unprofessional and flat out disrespectful. I had not arrived late, it was not a last minute appointment.
The doctor did not see me, she did not call me, nothing. I wrote this over a year later because it was such a stressful and scary moment for my health. I am grateful to have found physicians who care for their patients and their time.

Edit 10/20/22
In response to Dr. Bronfins comment below- I did not make any calls to the office since 2021.

originalText.text:
To describe Dr. Ludmilla Bronfin in one word "outstanding". On behalf of my mother, I am writing this post and share the same thoughts.  Fully knowledgeable and unbelievable bedside manners is truly missed within practices these days. The way Dr. Bronfin has been so present and attentive during our visits and addressing the issues on point is truly remarkable.  A life changer after her diagnosis and prescribed treatments.
Thank you a million times, Nolé Marin
